mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `plan` (uid, pid, symbol, first, second, third, stop, `trigger`, compare, `trigger1`, compare1, state, createTime, updateTime, `type`, orderIds) VALUES (#{uid}, #{pid}, #{symbol}, #{first}, #{second}, #{third}, #{stop}, #{trigger}, #{compare}, #{trigger1}, #{compare1}, #{state}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{type}, #{orderIds});
mapper.select: select * from `plan` where uid = #{uid} and state < 4 order by createTime;
SELECT p.* FROM plan p, USER u WHERE u.id = p.uid AND u.role = 0 AND createTime > DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL #{time} DAY) and state > 3 order by createTime;
SELECT p.* FROM plan p, USER u WHERE state < 4 AND u.id = p.uid AND u.role = 0 order by createTime;
mapper.update: update `plan` set state = #{state}, updateTime = #{updateTime}, orderIds = #{orderIds} where id = #{id};
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.uid, `symbol`, first, second, third, stop, `apikey` as createTime, `secretkey` as updateTime, `orderIds` FROM `plan` p, user u where p.uid = u.id and p.pid = #{id} AND p.state < 4

select p.`id`, p.`uid`, p.`pid`, p.`symbol`, p.`first`, p.`second`, p.`third`, p.`stop`, p.`trigger`, p.`compare`, p.`trigger1`, p.`compare1`, p.`state`, u.apikey as createTime, u.secretkey as updateTime, p.`type`, p.`orderIds` from `plan` p, user u where p.uid = u.id and state = #{state}
